TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EnterpriseServicesHelper extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides APIs that are needed for communication and operation with unmanaged classes outside of the .

span.span: Provides APIs that are needed for communication and operation with unmanaged classes outside of the .
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > Essa classe faz uma demanda de link.This class makes a link demand. Um SecurityException é gerado se o chamador imediato não tem permissão de infraestrutura.A SecurityException is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. Ver [demandas de Link](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) para obter mais informações.See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information.

permission.span: Para a operação com código de infraestrutura.

span.span: For operating with infrastructure code.

summary.span: Switches a [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md) (CCW) from one instance of a class to another instance of the same class.

span.span: Switches a [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md) (CCW) from one instance of a class to another instance of the same class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > Esse método pode causar um comportamento indesejado.This method can cause unwanted behavior. Antes de chamá-lo, o usuário deve garantir que se trata de uma operação de thread-safe, e que uma chamada não está sendo feita por meio do CCW para uma das instâncias da classe.Before calling it, the user must ensure that this is a thread-safe operation, and that a call is not being made through the CCW to one of the instances of the class.

exception.span: The immediate caller does not have UnmanagedCode permission.

summary.span: Wraps the specified COM interface with a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW).

span.span: Wraps the specified COM interface with a [Runtime Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/runtime-callable-wrapper.md) (RCW).

returns.span: The RCW where the specified is wrapped.

span.span: The RCW where the specified is wrapped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método é semelhante ao método, mas não tenta manter a identidade do objeto não gerenciado.The method is similar to the method, but does not attempt to maintain the identity of the unmanaged object. Por exemplo, duas chamadas com o mesmo `IUnknown` para o método atual retornar dois RCWs diferentes, mas duas chamadas para o método com o mesmo `IUnknown` retornam o mesmo RCW.For example, two calls with the same `IUnknown` to the current method return two different RCWs, but two calls to the method with the same `IUnknown` return the same RCW.
